definition: to inject/to pour into/to concentrate/to pay attention/stake (gambling)/classifier for sums of money/variant of 註|注[zhu4]
Italy/Italian/abbr. for 意大利[Yi4 da4 li4]

pinyin: zhu4 yi4 li4 bu4 zu2 guo4 dong4 zheng4
zhu4 yi4 li4 que1 shi1 zheng4
zhu4 yi4 li4 que1 xian4 duo1 dong4 zheng4
zhu4 yi4 li4 que1 xian4 guo4 dong4 zheng4

sentences.english: The nature of the stimulus may predispose some children to attention problems.
sentences.chinese: 刺激本身很可能使一些孩子易產生注意力問題。

sentences.english: The bright colours on the wall caught our attention.
sentences.chinese: 牆壁上鮮豔的顏色吸引了我們的注意力。

sentences.english: And light multitaskers might be better at preserving their attention.
sentences.chinese: 並且輕度的一心多用者可能更擅長保持注意力。

sentences.english: When you find yourself losing focus, get up and take a walk.
sentences.chinese: 當你發現自己開始注意力不集中，你可以站起來走走。

sentences.english: Can you choose where you focus your attention?
sentences.chinese: 你能決定你的注意力放在哪裏嗎？
我們的討論吸引了他的注意力。

sentences.english: Knowing that these thoughts are there is an important first stage in overcoming attention-seeking behaviour.
sentences.chinese: 要克服注意力尋求的行爲第一步是覺察這類的想法。

sentences.english: Instead, I prefer to focus on the positive aspects of a birthday.
sentences.chinese: 然而我更願意把注意力放在生日的積極意義上。

sentences.english: You already know that my diversion is ironing.
sentences.chinese: 你已經知道了，我自己轉移注意力的方法就是熨衣服。

sentences.english: Break your concentration and the ball descends.
sentences.chinese: 你注意力一旦分散，小球就會下降。

sentences.english: I'm frustrated that I can't concentrate on my homework.
sentences.chinese: 我沒法把注意力集中在我的作業上，真令人泄氣。

sentences.english: That is how people should overcome their left side, by putting their attention away from the dead things.
sentences.chinese: 這就是人們應當怎樣讓注意力脫離死物，以超越左脈。

sentences.english: The transformation was in focus and intention.
sentences.chinese: 轉變主要體現在注意力和意圖。

sentences.english: Expect plenty more herrings, then, red or otherwise.
sentences.chinese: 預計還有更多轉移注意力的東西或其它方式。
他用談話分散她的注意力。

sentences.english: So I turned my attention to running.
sentences.chinese: 所以我把注意力轉向了跑步。

definition: to shift/to divert or distract (attention etc)/to change/to transform/metastasis (medicine)/to evacuate (people)
to concentrate one's attention completely (idiom)/with rapt attention
to transfer/to maneuver (troops etc)/movement of personnel/to mobilize/to bring into play
to change direction/fig. to change one's stance
to get lost/to lose one's way
to lead to/to draw to/to steer towards
to shift one's eyes/(fig.) to shift one's attention/to divert attention
